title: Episode 177: Golden Gate Funeral Home
description:
This funeral home's legendary homegoings captured worldwide attention and landed it a television series that showed off its special way of sending people to their eternal resting places. But new lawsuits allege that, once the cameras switched off, the funerals it delivered were the stuff of nightmares.
